Package chav1961.purelib.fsys

This package contains a set of FileSystemInterface implementations and a factory to get access to them.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFileSystem
    This abstract class implements the most of all FileSystemInterface functionality.
    FileSystemFactory
    This class is a factory for creating file system instances for the given URI type.
    FileSystemOnFile
    This class implements the file system interface on the usual file system.
    FileSystemOnRMI
    This class implements the file system interface on remote server using Java RMI protocol.
    FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly
    This class implements the file system interface on the XML gile content.
    RMIFileSystemServer
    This class is a server to the FileSystemOnRMI class.

Package chav1961.purelib.fsys Description

This package contains a set of FileSystemInterface implementations and a factory to get access to them.

Every FileSystemInterface implementation is deployed into the Java runtime by the Java SPI protocol (the same one use all database JDBC drivers). Pure library includes File system interfaces for the usual file system and xml content files only. Extension of the library will contain much more implementations.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
